question.label: Any medical problem at present ? Describe with duration.
Do you see any doctor regularly ? If so, how often ?
Have you check your blood / serum / sputum before ? If so describe the findings.
Are you taking any medicine for certain medical problem ? If yes describe the problem, duration and present status.
Have you undergone full medical checkup before ? If yes please describe any abnormality and upload reports in you profile.
Do you wear spectacles If so no, for left and right eye ?
